title: Put It to Good Use!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Nico-san, Maru has so many flaws for a school idol, zura......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Flaws? Tell me about them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru has a tic and accidentally speaks in dialect... That’s not idol-like at all, zura~! Ah! It happened again!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>WHAT!? Isn’t that your strength!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Being super unique is a school idol’s biggest weapon! You have no idea how much time was spent developing the Nico Nico Nii!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huhhh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Being unique is not a bad thing. The more unique, the better. That’s why the way you speak is a strong weapon. You need to believe that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ni-Nico-san......! Nico-saaaaan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hey, stop being affectionate! You’re my rival..... Come on! I can’t compete against you if I get attached!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
